Comment: A unique identifier for the Contact record.
The Contact's preferred salutation, e.g. Mr, Mrs.
The Contact's first name.
The Contact's last/family name.
The Contact's job title.
The Contact's mobile phone number.
The Contact's direct telephone number.
The Contact's fax number.
The Contact's home phone number.
The Contact's email address.
All notes entered for the Contact on the Notes tab.

Postal address line 5. This line is only available on the Contacts window if the Additional Postal Address Row profile setting is enabled.

Whether the Contact is active (Y) or inactive (N).
The Contact's Advertising Source - corresponds to the SEQNO of the type in the ADVERT_TYPES table.
The STAFFNO of staff member who is set as the Sales person for the Contact.
The Contact's full name, formed by joining the FIRSTNAME and LASTNAME fields.
If the Contact is associated with a company (Debtor, Creditor or Non Account) the company's ID number is recorded here.
If the Contact is associated with a company (Debtor, Creditor or Non Account) the type of company account is recorded here:1 = Debtor account2 = Creditor account3 = Non Account
The Contact's MSN ID number.
The Contact's Yahoo! ID number.
The Contact's Skype ID number.
The date and time when the Contact record was last updated.

This field is set to 'Y' if the Contact's Opt-Out eMarketing flag is ticked. Contacts who have opted out of eMarketing will not be included in campaign waves for campaigns whose Campaign Type is set to "Marketing" (EXO Business CRM).
